text: (vegetation crunching)
(speaking foreign language)

- FarmByte is an AgriFood
digital aggregator

and we aspire to be an ecosystem
champion for food security.
We are vertically integrated
and our business model is one

where we connect many
farmers to many buyers.
FarmByte has three digital products.

There is the Farm app, there
is the Marketplace app,
and there is the Agri Input portal.

We use AWS to host our
digital applications
to push the boundaries in terms of
how we apply AI in agriculture.

We wanna be able to use AI to
create predictive capability.

Meaning that if you were
to start farming today,
what should you be planting?
Being cognizant of

how much prices will be when
you're ready for harvest.
We use AWS's technology to be able
to develop a machine learning
that can actually generate insight
to have this predictive capability.
When it comes to the warehouse operations,
we envision the use of vision
and technology to actually speed up

and helping us to scale and
move faster as an operations.
(gentle music)
- Currently, our process is 100% manual.
With a vision analytic on AWS,

we will have automation
machine in term of sorting,
grading, and quality checking.
We have scanner to scan every piece

of pineapple coming from
farm with 99% accuracy
in term of quality.

In term of our grading
process, we increase six time.
Currently with 12 people,
our output is only one ton per hour.
On AWS analytic, we increase our capacity,
accuracy to six times per hour.

- The future of farming in
Malaysia is one where we are able

to increase the income of
farmers, reduce wastage,
and agriculture as a sector
to be a greater contributor to the GDP.
(gentle music)
We are building something new in Malaysia

and we are comforted by
the fact that AWS is there

to help us scale and
uplift the life of farmers.
(gentle music)
